mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, gb_no, gb_id, guide_id, member_name, member_gender, guide_profile_rename, guide_lang, gb_start_date, gb_end_date, gm_date, gb_report, gm_report, grade_check, guide_service, loc_name, gb_route, gb_price, gb_open_date, gb_close_date, gb_title, guide_count, guide_grade from (select guideboard.gb_no, gb_id, guide_id, member_name, member_gender, guide_profile_rename, guide_lang, gb_start_date, gb_end_date, gm_date, gb_report, gm_report, grade_check, guide_service, loc_name, gb_route, gb_price, gb_open_date, gb_close_date, gb_title, guide_count, guide_grade from guideboard join guidematching on guideboard.gb_no = guidematching.gb_no join guide on guideboard.gb_id = guide.guide_id join location on guide.loc_code = location.loc_code join member on guide.guide_id = member.member_id where gm_id = #{value} order by gb_start_date desc, gb_end_date desc))

select * from (select rownum rnum, gb_no, gm_id, gb_id, member_name, member_gender, member_profile_rename, gm_date, gb_start_date, gb_end_date, gb_report, gm_report, grade_check, gm_number, loc_name from (select guidematching.gb_no, gm_id, gb_id, member_name, member_gender, member_profile_rename, gm_date, gb_start_date, gb_end_date, gb_report, gm_report, grade_check, gm_number, loc_name from guidematching join guideboard on guidematching.gb_no = guideboard.gb_no join guide on guideboard.gb_id = guide.guide_id join location on guide.loc_code = location.loc_code join member on guidematching.gm_id = member.member_id where gb_id = #{value} order by gb_start_date desc, gb_end_date desc))
select * from fellowmatching join fellowboard on fellowmatching.fb_no = fellowboard.fb_no join member on fellowboard.fb_id = member.member_id where fb_id = #{value}
select * from fellowboard join fellowmatching on fellowboard.fb_no = fellowmatching.fb_no join member on fellowmatching.fm_id = member.member_id where fm_id = #{value}
